mapper.insert: INSERT INTO h_room(roomNum, shopCode, roomName, mainImg, detail_1, detail_2, detail_3, detail_4, detail_5, intro, roomType, bed, hotelView, capacity, charge) VALUES(roomNum.nextval, 102, #{roomName}, #{mainImg}, #{detail_1}, #{detail_2}, #{detail_3}, #{detail_4}, #{detail_5}, #{intro}, #{roomType}, #{bed}, #{hotelView}, #{capacity}, #{charge})
mapper.select: SELECT roomNum, shopCode, roomName, mainImg, detail_1, detail_2, detail_3, detail_4, detail_5, intro, roomType, bed, hotelView, capacity, charge FROM h_room
